document.full_text: a hard-line islamist group enforced a general strike demanding the adoption of islamic law and the scrapping of a new government policy that gives women equal rights to inheritance.
document.title: asia: bangladesh: islamist strike shuts cities
lines_and_colors: a hard-line islamist group enforced a general strike demanding the adoption of islamic law and the scrapping of a new government policy that gives women equal rights to inheritance.
